description:
Unlock a special scenario and create Aqua’s special costume, ‘Deluxe Aqua’.
Although heroines in swimsuits also appear in the main game, you can enjoy a special swimsuit and additional scenario is an original design exclusive to the DLC!
Incorporating her key motif, this swimsuit is based on the main costume of Aqua.
The degree of exposure of the special swimsuit event CG changes depending on the materials used!
The story changes depending on the differences, allowing you to enjoy various sides to Aqua.
The DLC will become available in Chapter 2 after you have received a new set of recipes from Vanir. The recipe list will contain a wide range of outfits for you to choose from, but only this DLC will allow you to unlock ‘Deluxe Aqua’.
name: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World! Love For These Clothes Of Desire! - Aqua Special Swimsuit
